unnormalised: Arre bhai, NH44 is a total mess these days, especially near Karnal. Took me like 6 hrs to reach Chandigarh from Delhi last week. Google Maps showed only 3 hrs 30 mins, total bakwaas! Heard they are doing some construction. Better to take the train, yaar. Maybe check out the Delhi-Kalka Shatabdi. Departs 7:40 AM, usually on time!
normalised: Arre bhai, N-H forty four is a total mess these days, especially near Karnal. Took me like six hours to reach Chandigarh from Delhi last week. Google Maps showed only three hours thirty minutes, total bakwaas! Heard they are doing some construction. Better to take the train, yaar. Maybe check out the Delhi-Kalka Shatabdi. Departs seven forty A-M, usually on time!
